content: Up at Cloudnest Peak, you'll find The Duskveil. This is the final boss of the secret area, so killing it will trigger a cutscene and transport you out of the area. You'll also receive the Weaver's Needle Vessel from completing this fight.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Chapter 4 Secrets" and the sub-section "The Duskveil - Purple Cloud Mountain". The content is presented below:

Up at Cloudnest Peak, you'll find The Duskveil. This is the final boss of the secret area, so killing it will trigger a cutscene and transport you out of the area. You'll also receive the Weaver's Needle Vessel from completing this fight.
